slide-title: "Frustra fit per plura, quod potest fieri per pauciora."
"It is pointless to do with more what can be done with fewer."

In basic terms...

Unless there is a need
then you don't need it
Fluff isn't all bad, so long as it's not prioritised early
It's the bow on a wrapped present
What can help with being sharp rather than fluffy?
